      • addRefuel

        public boolean addRefuel(java.lang.String litres,
                         java.lang.String price,
                         java.lang.String odo,
                         java.lang.String date,
                         java.lang.String fueltype,
                         java.lang.String place)
        inserts refuelling values into database table
        Parameters:
        litres - number of refuelled litres
        price - amount of money paid for fuel
        odo - state of odometer
        date - date, when refuelling was made
        fueltype - type of fuel
        place - name of gas station
        Returns:
        true or false, checks, if inserting was successful

      • addInsp

        public boolean addInsp(java.lang.String insptype,
                       java.lang.String price,
                       java.lang.String odo,
                       java.lang.String date,
                       java.lang.String success,
                       java.lang.String station)
        inserts inspection values into database table
        Parameters:
        insptype - type of inspection
        price - amount of money paid for inspection
        odo - state of odometer
        date - date, when inspection was done
        success - whenever inspection was successful or not
        station - name of inspection station
        Returns:
        true or false, checks, if inserting was successful

      • addTrip

        public boolean addTrip(java.lang.String trip,
                       java.lang.String odoPrev,
                       java.lang.String odoCur,
                       java.lang.String date,
                       java.lang.String notes)
        inserts trip values into database table
        Parameters:
        trip - point A - point B of trip
        odoPrev - state of odometer at the beginning of trip
        odoCur - state of odometer at the end of trip
        date - date, when trip was done
        notes - notes
        Returns:
        true or false, checks, if inserting was successful
